    public abstract class Subscription<CONTENT>
extends org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.IsolationBladeBase
implements org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.closeable.Closeable
    A subscription allows a subscriber to receive content of interest from a RequestBus.
